job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance platform and services for Uber's cyber defense
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of software engineering, focusing on building and scaling platform and services.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This statement explicitly mentions the use of 'AI models and algorithms' to drive a transformation, indicating a focus on the application and development of these models.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding the needs of domain experts (cybersecurity experts) and converting them into technical specifications, which is a key aspect of business understanding in a technical context.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with other engineering teams to build complete solutions, a common software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior security engineers
job_tasks.justification: These are all standard practices within software development, emphasizing code quality, collaboration, and team development.

job_tasks.phrase: play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy
job_tasks.justification: Shaping strategy implies understanding business objectives and aligning technical work with them.

soft_skills.phrase: architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense
lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
Collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams
role models, but also empathic leaders. You are humble teachers

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes leveraging AI models and algorithms for threat defense and response, aligning with the core of ML Engineering. While it involves software development, the primary focus is on applying AI to solve specific cybersecurity problems rather than building generative AI applications for end-users.
